Title: Episode Two
Plot: Curtis uses his new gender-swap power so that he can compete again in the sport of athletics. There ends up being a complication when Curtis falls for Emma, one of the other athletes. Curtis can't tell Emma the truth about his real identity. A predatory figure ends up turning his advances towards the female Curtis.
ParentalRatingReason: R18 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
Director: Wayne Che Yip, Alex Garcia Lopez
